00025 #include "ext.h"                                // Required for all Max External Objects
00026 #include "ext_strings.h"                // Used for the assistance strings
00027 #include "z_dsp.h"                              // Required for all MSP externals
00028 
00029 t_class *count_tilde_class;                                     // Required. Global pointing to this class
00030 
00031 
00032 // Data Structure for this object
00033 typedef struct _count_tilde{            // Data Structure for this object
00034         t_pxobject ob;                                  // Required by MSP (must be first)
00035         long            value;                          // stored count value
00036 } t_count_tilde;
00037 
00038 
00039 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message type:
00040 void count_tilde_dsp(t_count_tilde *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);                    // DSP Method
00041 void count_tilde_assist(t_count_tilde *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);    // Assistance Method
00042 void *count_tilde_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);                            // New Object Creation Method
00043 t_int *count_tilde_perform(t_int *w);
00044 void count_tilde_free(t_count_tilde *x);
00045 void count_tilde_activate(t_count_tilde *x, short toggle);
00046 
00047 
00048 /************************************************************************************/
00049 // Main() Function
00050 
00051 int main(void)  
00052 {
00053         setup((t_messlist **)&count_tilde_class, (method)count_tilde_new, (method)dsp_free, (short)sizeof(t_count_tilde), 0L, 0);
00054         
00055         addmess((method)count_tilde_dsp, "dsp", A_CANT, 0);                     // Bind method "teabox_dsp" to the DSP call from MSP
00056         addmess((method)count_tilde_assist,"assist", A_CANT, 0);        // Bind method "teabox_assist" to assistance calls
00057 
00058         dsp_initclass();                                                                                        // Setup object's class to work with MSP
00059         return 0;
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 /************************************************************************************/
00064 // Object Creation Method
00065 
00066 void *count_tilde_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00067 {
00068         t_count_tilde *x = (t_count_tilde *)newobject(count_tilde_class);
00069         dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x,1);
00070         outlet_new((t_object *)x, "signal");    // Create signal outlet
00071         x->value = 0;
00072         return (x);
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 /************************************************************************************/
00077 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00078 
00079 // Method for Assistance Messages
00080 void count_tilde_assist(t_count_tilde *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00081 {
00082         if(msg==1) strcpy(dst, "(signal) input from teabox");   // Inlet
00083         else if(msg==2) strcpy(dst, "(signal) index");                  // Outlet               
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 // Perform (signal) Method
00088 t_int *count_tilde_perform(t_int *w)
00089 {
00090         t_count_tilde *x = (t_count_tilde *)(w[1]);     // Pointer      
00091         t_float *in = (t_float *)(w[2]);                        // Inlet
00092         t_float *out = (t_float *)(w[3]);                       // Outlet
00093         int n = (int)(w[4]);                                            // Vector Size
00094         float value;
00095         
00096         if (x->ob.z_disabled) goto out;
00097         
00098         
00099         while(n--){     
00100                 value = *in++;                                                  // load input sample
00101                 
00102                 x->value++;
00103 
00104                 if(value < 0)
00105                         x->value = 0;
00106                 
00107                 *out++ = x->value;                      // Output stored count value                    
00108         }
00109 out:
00110     return (w+5);
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 // DSP Method
00115 void count_tilde_dsp(t_count_tilde *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00116 {
00117         dsp_add(count_tilde_perform, 4, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);
00118 }
